description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2019.010.20069 and earlier, 2019.010.20069 and earlier, 2017.011.30113 and earlier version, and 2015.006.30464 and earlier have an integer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.
